alert.note: Alert for Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range; Upper Gila River Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 3:25PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Grant County through 400 PM MDT... At 325 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles east of Buckhorn, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cliff, Buckhorn, Riverside, Gila, and Mogollon Box Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range; Upper Gila River Valley
